title.rendered: Clark Davis Joins Highland Resources Inc. As CEO

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce that Clark Davis recently joined Highland Resources as CEO. Reporting to and working directly with the Board of Directors, Davis will be responsible for reviewing HRI’s current portfolio of assets and developing an overall investment, development, and asset management strategy to maximize value from the existing investment portfolio.

Davis joins Highland Resources from Transwestern’s development arm, Transwestern Development Company (TDC), where he served as Senior Partner of Asset Management, Business/Strategic Development, and Office/Multi-Family/Industrial Development. Prior to Transwestern, Davis worked with TIER REIT, a Dallas-based development platform which repositioned office assets in key Southeast U.S. markets.

“Clark brings a deep background in commercial real estate development, investing, and operations. Our team is excited for Clark to bring his depth of experience in real estate to Highland Resources,” said Scott Petty, Managing Partner of Chartwell Partners’ Financial Services Practice.

 

About Highland Resources, Inc.

Based in Houston, Texas, Highland Resources, Inc. is a family-owned real estate investment and development company with a proud history and remarkable track record of success in developing residential and commercial projects. The company has accumulated and owns more than 25,000 acres of land, 5.6 million square-feet of industrial space and numerous office buildings and shopping centers in Texas and Arkansas. Highland is currently developing six different tracts of land in Texas, South Carolina and Oklahoma for commercial, mixed use and residential opportunities. Additionally, the company owns and operates Highland Deephaven, a 430-acre industrial development located near Inverness, Scotland, servicing the North Sea oil industry.

About Chartwell Partners

As a leader in real estate executive search, Scott Petty serves real estate firms across the U.S. focused on recruiting Board directors and C-Suite executives for our clients.  Founded in 2005 by a group of global search firm professionals, Chartwell Partners is a top executive search firm offering a more highly engaged experience for both clients and candidates throughout the executive recruitment process.
